attributes.additional_details: Following recent revelations by Edwards Snowden and others, we, the British public, do not want US telecommunication-interception stations spying on us, reading our emails, monitoring our social networking communications, listening to our telephone calls and providing co-ordinates for US drone attacks abroad. We demand closure of the US stations at Menwith Hill, Alconbury, Croughton, Mildenhall, Lakenheath and elsewhere on our soil.
